extendedInfo.description: If you are Clap Your Hands Say Yeah's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Clap Your Hands Say Yeah's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Clap Your Hands Say Yeah's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Clap Your Hands Say Yeah's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Clap Your Hands Say Yeah- Some Loud Thunder- Hysterical************************List of lyrics ************************- Adam's Plane- Arm And Hammer- Clap Your Hands!- Details Of The War- Emily Jean Stock- Five Easy Pieces- Gimme Some Salt- Goodbye To Mother And The Cove- Heavy Metal- Hysterical- Idiot- In A Motel- In This Home On Ice- Into Your Alien Arms- Is This Love?- Ketamine And Ecstasy- Let The Cool Goddess Rust Away- Love Song No. 7- Mama, Won't You Keep Them Castles In The Air And Burning?- Maniac- Misspent Youth- Over And Over Again (Lost & Found)- Same Mistake- Satan Said Dance- Siesta (For Snake)- Some Loud Thunder- The Skin Of My Yellow Country Teeth- The Sword Song- The Witness' Dull Surprise- Underwater (You And Me)- Upon This Tidal Wave Of Young Blood- Yankee Go Home- Yesterday, Never
